name: Bolt Action Rifle
description: The Bolt Action Rifle is the first long-rangeFirearmthat prospectors can create. It can utilize the7.62mm Round, theIncendiary Rifle Round, etc. Along with theShotgun, it provides Prospectors with a significant increase in survivability when encountering theFaunaof Icarus. The Bolt Action Rifle can fire 75 rounds before breaking, and the talentGunsmithcan increase this to up to a maximum of 90 rounds, so bring aMachining Benchfor long trips.
